member.name: F:PerMonitorDpi.Models.Win32.NativeMethod.MONITOR_DEFAULTTO.MONITOR_DEFAULTTONEAREST

member.name: F:PerMonitorDpi.Models.Win32.NativeMethod.MONITOR_DPI_TYPE.MDT_Effective_DPI
member.summary: Effective DPI that incorporates accessibility overrides and matches what Desktop Window Manage (DWM) uses to scale desktop applications

member.name: F:PerMonitorDpi.Models.Win32.NativeMethod.MONITOR_DPI_TYPE.MDT_Angular_DPI
member.summary: DPI that ensures rendering at a compliant angular resolution on the screen, without incorporating accessibility overrides

member.name: F:PerMonitorDpi.Models.Win32.NativeMethod.MONITOR_DPI_TYPE.MDT_Raw_DPI

member.summary: Window chrome outmost border (private use only)

member.summary: Title bar caption buttons' panel (private use only)

member.summary: Whether to keep title and content margin even when a Window is maximized
member.remarks: False by OS's default.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.BlendsCaptionButtonVisualStyle
member.summary: Whether to blend colors for caption buttons' visual style with their normal color
member.remarks: This blending is for the case the colors are translucent.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.UsesDefaultChromeBackground
member.summary: Whether to use OS's default chrome background
member.remarks: Default value must be false to execute initial check.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.DefaultChromeBackground
member.summary: OS's default chrome background Brush when a Window is activated (public readonly)
member.remarks: Default value (SystemColors.ActiveCaptionBrush) is merely for fall back.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.ChromeBackground
member.summary: Chrome background Brush when a Window is activated

member.summary: Chrome foreground Brush when a Window is activated
member.remarks: Black by OS's default.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.ChromeDeactivatedBackground
member.summary: Chrome background Brush when a Window is deactivated
member.remarks: Default value (#FFebebeb) is for OS's default.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.ChromeDeactivatedForeground
member.summary: Chrome foreground Brush when a Window is deactivated
member.remarks: Black by OS's default.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.ChromeBorderThickness
member.remarks: 1 by OS's default.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.ChromeBorderBrush
member.remarks: Default value (#3C000000) is for reproducing OS's default.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.TitleBarNormalHeight
member.summary: Title bar height when a Window is other than maximized
member.remarks: This height includes neither chrome outer border thickness nor chrome inner border thickness. By OS's default, title bar height (when a window is maximized) will be sum of SystemParameters.WindowResizeBorderThickness.Top and SystemParameters.WindowNonClientFrameThickness.Top which includes chrome border thickness.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.TitleBarMaximizedHeight
member.summary: Title bar height when a Window is maximized

member.summary: Title bar padding at the left side

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.TitleBarPaddingRight
member.summary: Title bar padding at the right side

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.IconSize
member.summary: Size of icon (Window.Icon) in title bar

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.TitleAlignment
member.summary: Alignment of title (Window.Title) in title bar

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.TitleFontSize
member.summary: Font size of title (Window.Title) in title bar
member.remarks: Default value (14) is for OS's default.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.ContentMargin
member.remarks: Default value (6,0,6,6) is for reproducing OS's default.

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.ContentBorderThickness

member.name: P:PerMonitorDpi.Views.ExtendedWindow.ContentBorderBrush
